items.content_html: Parks & Rec Backend is a lightweight Express.js + SQLite3 backend designed to handle program registrations for public users and program management for admin users. Public users can sign up and pay for programs, while admin users can oversee program details and access rosters.
items.title: aRonnieAlsop/parks_and_rec_backend: Parks & Rec Backend is a lightweight Express.js + SQLite3 backend designed to handle program registrations for public users and program management for admin users. Public users can sign up and pay for programs, while admin users can oversee program details and access rosters.
